targets.query:
import "sampledata"
sampledata.string()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: "${host}"}))
  |> yield(name: "text")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ctxt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "arc_size")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "arcsz")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "hits")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hits" or r["_field"] == "misses")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "l2hits")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hits" or r["_field"] == "misses")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ram")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "intr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "active_processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "l2_size")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "size")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "load")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cputemp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "temperatures")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nut_ups")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "ram")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk_iotime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /^${disk:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "smart_log_smart")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "disktemp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /^${disk:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /^${nic:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "received")
  |> derivative(nonNegative:true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /^${nic:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sent")
  |> derivative(nonNegative:true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 8.0}))

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["type"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["type"])
  |> distinct(column: "type")
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["type"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["type"])
  |> distinct(column: "type")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["type"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["type"])
  |> distinct(column: "type")
list.label: NIC
list.name: nic
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["type"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["type"])
  |> distinct(column: "type")
